songs.title: Classroom

Lyrics from snippets

[Intro]
Yo
Yo Pi'erre, you wanna come out here?

I was in the classroom selling boof
I was in the classroom smoking boof (What?)
In the bathroom [?]
Yo Pi'erre, let's take them boys to school
Yo Pi'erre, let's take them boys to school
Yo Pi'erre, let's take them boys to school
I was in the classroom selling boof
In the classroom smoking boof

[Verse]
...
[?]
In the classroom selling boof
Told my teacher he ain't shit 'cause Carti came up counting loot (Cash)
